name: Guns N Rhythm
description:
HOLY HELL

This might be the buggiest, most incomplete game I have ever posted on my profile.

Anyways

Guns N Rhythm is a game made for the 2020 Mix N Game Jam

This local multiplayer game  is a mix between a rhythm game and a fighting game.

*PLEASE READ*

Due to time constraints and VERY stress inducing bugs, this game is less than 50% completed and is not even intended to be actually played, so please set your expectations lower.

Tutorial:

The game has alternating waves, a charging phase and an attack phase. The first wave always starts with a charging phase, during this phase both players are subject to the same rhythm pattern and must hit the notes accordingly to gain attack points. Once the first wave is over, the first attack phase starts and the player on the left side is allowed to attack (this will switch to the right player in the next attack wave). Simply press buttons accordingly to spawn notes on your opponents bar if you are attacking, your opponent will then have to hit the notes to the rhythm that you created, otherwise take damage. The attack phase is only considered over when the attacking player has spent all their attack points, by then the wave switches back to the charging phase.

Controls for left side player:

- A for black notes

- D for white notes

- W to attack with black notes

- S to attack with white notes

Controls for right side player:

- Right key for black notes

- Left key for white notes

- Up key to attack with black notes

- Down key to attack with white notes

Thanks for playing/checking out my game, I hope to release a full version soon without being rushed.
